author: Irene
title: Good set.
review:
This set has 20 pieces as it was bagged at the Lego store.

As I am an adult, I had to wait until after the build date, and ask for a set. Luckily there were some left over.

There were no instructions on the day that I picked it up, but it was easy to build by duplicating the set that was on display. 

The instructions, as on line, are for a set with 28 pieces.  Most notably, the house is no longer a cylinder, but is made of a 1x1 brick (lantern) that gets 4 1x1 tiles.  In the instructions there are also a few more clear dots, and the Light house lamp is different.

This set is a very tiny scale. It is more a display, than a play piece.  No minifigure would ever fit inside, and it is even smaller than most mini-size city displays.
